EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-04-18 Cisco Turbonomic Learning Center 2.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic & Cisco: Delivering Self-Managing Systems to the Intent-Based Data Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As an OEM partner, we are very excited to be working with Cisco to bring self-managing systems to the intent-based data center. With an expanding list of purpose-built Cisco integrations—including UCS, HyperFlex, AppDynamics, Tetration, CloudCenter, and more—our software is assuring performance while driving greater elasticity in some of the world's largest, most complex environments.
Check out our new learning center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco]]> to learn more about the partnership and how customers can benefit:
- Demo Videos – Showcasing Turbonomic integrations with HyperFlex <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco/turbonomic-amp-cisco-hyperflex-integration-demo]]>, AppDynamics <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco/appd-turbonomic-integration-demo]]>, and Tetration <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco/tetration-demo-final]]>
- Partnership Video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco/cisco-turbo-partnership]]> - Cisco explains why this partnership matters
- Customer Video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco/cisco-amp-turbonomic-success-at-scale]]> – Cisco explains their success as a customer of Turbonomic
- Turbonomic & HyperFlex Technical White Paper <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco/turbonomic-hyperflex-white-paper]]> – Achieving Agility & Predictable Performance with Self-Managing Hyperconverged Systems
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/cisco]]>
Regards, Team Turbonomic
